title: Bug 44164: Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData)
OB: The constructor for Image(Device, ImageData) can also throw org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Unsupported color depth.
EB: Expected Behavior is that the javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) should include information about the potential exception it can throw, specifically the org.eclipse.swt.SWTException related to unsupported color depth.
SR:
Steps to recreate (note that the ImageData is successfully created, it is Image that is throwing the exception):

1. write `import org.eclipse.swt.graphics.`
